channel.title: Posts on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Portfolio

item.title: Creating This Website
item.description: Creating This Website This simple personal website was made following this book: blogdown: Creating Websites with R Markdown I am using it as a simple, easily managed portfolio and personal website, documenting personal projects and other content. Technologies Used: Markdown (Using Typora) R (Using R Studio) Github Netlify All posts are written in Typora, my preferred Markdown editor. Markdown is a simple markup language, that I think makes exceptionally clean and modern websites.
